name: Show Off
description:
Cute animals dancing!

One of the cutest dancing animal games ever! Grab a friend and see if they can keep up with your amazing animal dance moves.

In Show Off, one player dances, the other player tries to match their moves! But the longer the game progresses, the harder it gets for both the call and the response.

Stay sharp and show off your dance moves!

If you like the music, it's available here, or via Bandcamp for $2!
